item.title: Obese websites and planet-sized metronomes
item.description: A reflection on website obesity and my attempt to make a 981-byte metronome app.

item.title: Did the Beatles love "you"?
item.description: Overanalysing a claim that putting "you" in the first line of a song makes it better.

item.title: Counting the number of days until your birthday and why it's a useful programming trick
item.description: There's a formula for interval length that saves you from finger-counting.

item.title: Finding Mona Lisa in the Game of Life
item.description: Using a SAT-solver to find Game of Life states that turn into pictures.

item.title: Random RGB values that average to N; or, Pointlessness and Probability
item.description: A simple-seeming problem is solved using tricky combinatorics.

item.title: Solving all 42 versions of the Harry Potter potions puzzle
item.description: Brute-force search is applied to a puzzle from Harry Potter.

item.title: The story of u/AnEmojipastaBot
item.description: A Reddit bot whose function was to turn comments into emojipasta.

item.title: Simulating plane designs for faster boarding
item.description: Moving entrances closer to the middle could make plane boarding faster.
